body.name: Pine-Sol Microfiber Self Wringing – Easy Squeeze Twist Design for Wet Mopping | Household Cleaning Tool for Tile, Linoleum, Laminate Floors | Extendable Metal Handle, Green
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 14 mins
features: EASY WRING MOP FOR DEEP CLEANING – Gentle microfiber mop head makes this hard floor mop perfect for cleaning laminate, tile, and linoleum. Loop end mop minimizes tangling to improve floor cleaning coverage.

TWIST MOP KEEPS HANDS DRY – Self wringing mop features an easy squeeze method, so you don’t have to touch filthy mop water. Simply twist mop head to wring, and then push down to remove excess water into a sink or mop bucket.

MICROFIBER MOP FOR FLOOR CLEANING – Microfiber string mop is highly absorbent for efficient wet mopping. The double tail bands effectively collect and remove dust, hair, and debris from hard surfaces.

SPACE-SAVING TELESCOPING MOP – Adjustable mop handle extends to 50” for hard-to-reach areas. Retracts to 31.75” for compact storage. Metal mop handle is made of heavy duty stainless steel with a soft grip pad for a comfortable hold.
QUICK & EASY CLEANING TOOL – Simple to use, clean, and store for a household essential. Hanging hole makes for easy storage on hooks in garages and inside cleaning supply closets.
body.description: Save time with the Pine-Sol Twist Microfiber Mop. This self wringing mop features an easy squeeze design to make cleaning floors a simple, stress-free task.Whether it is for the home or the office, and whether you mop on a weekly schedule or need on the spot, this twist mop by Pine-Sol is the most convenient way to clean your floors. This microfiber mop quickly absorbs water on first pass to shorten your cleaning time.Product Details:• Microfiber threads are more absorbent than cotton• Twist, lock , and push system wrings out water without getting your hands dirty• Telescopic stainless steel handle extends to 50 inches• Handle retracts to 30 inches for easy, compact storage• Thoroughly scrubs, removes dust, and deep cleans• Suitable for use on tile, linoleum, laminate, hardwood and marble flooringWringing Instructions:1. To wring mop pull mop head handle up onto the locking tube2. Twist mop head handle to squeeze out excess water3. Push mop head handle down to flush the water into your mop bucket

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I really like this mop. It’s super absorbent but also pretty easy to ring out and doesn’t over wet the floors. The strings are thick and plentiful and if feels like high quality. I really have to add that I like the bright green mop head because it adds a cleaner look to the mop. It’s very light weight, easy to use and cleans effectively. Exceeded my expectations. Thanks mop makers/ designers! Ya did good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It's Trash. The mop disconnects from the wring head and thats it. Throw it away
reviews.reviewText: Very cheaply designed - No product support. The mechanism holding the mop to the wringing mechanism break very easy as it is connected with only cheap plastic tabs. Not worth the money

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great PVA sponge roller mop
reviews.reviewText: This is the best mop I have ever owned bar none! Believe me you can't go wrong buying this PVA sponge roller mop. Well made and durable. Just make sure you soak it in Hot water before you use it for the first time as it comes in very hard but after soaking it it softens right up and remains soft. If you try to wring it out before it is soft you will damage it. Otherwise I can see this lasting years. I hate that the comments are for three different mops

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fastest replacement ever
reviews.reviewText: Broke after 3 weeks. I dealt directly with manufacturer for replacement. Easiest and fastest fix. Pine Sol customer service is exceptional and kept me informed thru emails every step of the way. My rep was Anna C kudos Anna!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars I love the width and material of mop.
reviews.reviewText: Loved to mop. Everything about it. The only thing is the mop head slipped of the pole and I have been looking for a mop head replacement and can’t find one. I also tried to put it back on pole to be able to twist it but it won’t work. I will buy another mop if I can’t find a replacement . That’s how much I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It worked great and kept my hands out of the mop water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pine sol mop
reviews.reviewText: I use this mop often and while it does a very decent job, it is difficult to expel the excess water. You see, you have to pull up the mop head until it reaches a grid on the pole. then you have to twist to wring the mop. I have arthritic hands and twisting the mop head causes me much pain. And releasing the head to get the mop action is still a hit and miss for me. I bought one for my Mom as well. At 86 , she finds it looks better in the corner and she'll continue to get on her hands and knees to scrub the floor. Both of us have pinched our fingers trying to use this mop. Please work on a better way to wring the darn thing. Oh, and sometimes the handle slips into short mode. Some how it releases the lock and shortens mid stroke. That's a bit dangerous for elders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Telescope is fantastic, but mop always breaks.
reviews.reviewText: I clean houses part time. This is my third purchase of this product in a year. Why third? Because just like other pics describe, it break when rinsing. I think the plastic just stretches out and it slips down. Why not make that piece more solid? You can push it back up into place, but that’s super gross to touch a dirty mop over and over. And then when I try to rinse, I have to hold top in place. Very cheaply made for the price I pay. Unfortunately I need a telescoping handle to fit the mop neatly in my trunk. Another maker could totally make a telescoping handle on a better mop and i’d buy it. In the meantime, I will continue to buy this piece of crap, because they have me by the short hairs. I need it to compact. So, thanks for your expensive, piece of crap mop that doesn’t last, but that I’m forced to buy for lack of another telescoping mop. I will switch the minute I see one come out.Mixed rating: Great idea. Horrible production.
Es ligero, limpia muy bien las superficies lisas.

reviews.reviewerName: As an outdoors man of 5 decades, the magnesium block is far to hard to get decent shavings and the striker is inadequate in size, you willmfind it difficult to start a fire in all but perfect conditions, wind forget it, rain forget it, no really dry tinder forget it,,,,going bush take fuel and a  lighter...plan ahead
reviews.reviewText: Mop head detaches after very few uses

reviews.reviewTitle: Mop head falls offNo customer service responseVery dissatisfied
reviews.reviewText: Used onceMop head fell offCan’t re attachContacted company no response
Se suelta al exprimir , esta muy feo, no me dieron opción de regresar
